item.title: Personal GRE Summary
item.description: personal experience of gre. Verbal Reasoning Good video suggested from Youtube: GRE Verbal Section Walkthrough: How I take the test (Part 1) 等號 強詞 逆向思維 浮動思維 Verbal Time Arrangement word,2 min short essay :1.5:1 middle essay: 2.5:1 long essay: 4.5:1 閱讀 內容 3s 句子 段 篇 句間關系 同 反 but, yet,however,nevertheless 換對象 否定含義單詞 criticize, oppose, deny, reject
